title: Putting it into Practice
intro: Now that you know the Intranet path, let's test it in practice!

quiz.question: A customer calls asking if the Downtown store is open on tomorrow's holiday. You don't know this information by heart. What is the most agile and safe procedure?
quiz.opt_a: A) Ask quickly in the team's WhatsApp group to see if anyone knows.
quiz.feedback_wrong_a: Asking in the WhatsApp group may bring outdated or wrong information. The official source is always the Intranet.
quiz.opt_b: B) Consult the Intranet under 'Branches' > 'Registration data and schedules' to have the official information.
quiz.opt_c: C) Search on Google Maps, because it is always updated there.
quiz.feedback_wrong_c: Google Maps is not always updated with special holiday hours. The Intranet is the company's only official source.
quiz.opt_d: D) Inform that it will probably be closed, to avoid the customer making a wasted trip.
quiz.feedback_wrong_d: Giving information without certainty can cause frustration to the customer. Never 'assume' answers - consult the official source.
quiz.feedback: Correct Answer! The Intranet is the only official and reliable source for branch schedules.

importance_text: Mastering this query ensures agility in service, more assertive answers, standardization of information and a more positive experience for the customer.
